mainHeadline:
Online masterclasses
from the world's greatest guitarists
mainSubline: tonebase gives you instant access to knowledge from the world's greatest guitarists, performers and educators. Simple, easy, on-demand and on-line.

features.imageClasses: col-xs-12 col-xs-offset-0 col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1 col-md-5 col-md-offset-0 col-md-push-7 hero-image
features.infoClasses: col-xs-12 col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1 col-md-7 col-md-offset-0 col-md-pull-5 features-info
features.headline: Modern, Interactive Learning Environment
features.subline: tonebase provides a robust 21st century learning environment for guitar. Interactive score integration allows you to switch between the artists explanation and an image of the sheet music being played allowing you to easily follow the concepts being described.

features.imageClasses: col-xs-12 col-xs-offset-0 col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1 col-md-5 col-md-offset-0 hero-image
features.infoClasses: col-xs-12 col-xs-offset-0 col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1 col-md-7 col-md-offset-0 features-info
features.headline: Access to High-Level Artists & Educators
features.subline: tonebase works with a community of the worlds most accomplished artists & educators to source our exclusive content. This means the ideas, talent and technique on the platform is unmatched anywhere on the internet- Youtube, Vimeo, you name it.

features.imageClasses: col-xs-12 col-xs-offset-0 col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1 col-md-5 col-md-offset-0 col-md-push-7 hero-image
features.infoClasses: col-xs-12 col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1 col-md-7 col-md-offset-0 col-md-pull-5 features-info
features.headline: Our Proceeds Directly Benefit Musicians
features.subline: tonebase justly compensates all our artists for their knowledge and time. Artists are the key to our platform and we treat them with fairness and humility. Artists share in the profits of the platform and are compensated on a per video basis.

interestedSectionHTML:
tonebase is currently in a private beta and will launch in June. Visit our booth at GFA 2017.

Enter your email address to request early access and to receive alerts as we launch!
aboutSectionText: tonebase, inc. aims to democratize music education by opening access to the world's greatest artists and educators. By providing a platform for the world to engage with the knowledge these legends have collected over their illustrious careers, we hope to inspire the next generation of musicians and bring music education into the 21st century.
aboutSectionCompanyHTML: tonebase, inc. was founded at Yale University. It is currently funded by the Yale Entrepreunerial Institute. To learn more about the team or if you have any questions please contact us.
